resources.string:
Help us to make the world a better place.
Simply register your item & documents
 and benifit every day from our fraud
 preventing blockchain solutions.
By registering your item and documents you can start enjoying benifit from our innovative fraud preventing blockchain solutions.

Please upload three pictures which will be used
 to validate your item.
 1. Picture were the serial number is clearly visible
 2. Picture of full frontside
 3. Picture of the full backside.
